title: 初出茅庐
info: abuout Python is a dynamic and strongly typed programming language that is used for a wide range of applications. It is a general-purpose, high-level programming language that is designed to emphasize usability. Python programmers can express concepts in fewer lines of code than would be possible in languages such as C, and the language has constructs intended to be used to create clear programs in a variety of domains. Two similar but incompatible versions of Python are in widespread use (2 and 3). Please consider mentioning the version and implementation that you are using when asking a question about Python.
